title: important information of current Hong Kong status

replies.msg:
Hong Kong police cannot get tear gear from outer country, so get from China, but everyone know China product is toxic, ppl is confirned China tear gas have toxic meterial Shan Ai(no smell and no see, only use machine to detect) and police shooting tear gas indoor, the toxic metetal will not go out, stay inside for a long time
after some time, the floor, the wall will have toxuc, if you touch the wall, your hand will toxic, go to your skin, to your body, possible cause health issue and die for serious(no joking)
so for you safe, better no visit Hong Kong at these days, until riot is completed. Also, riot not cover by insurance, in case some bad thing to you, you cant claim insurance, then will GG you see the tv yesterday, police even shooting ppl house, nowhere is safe now!!!!

it's unnecessary to told them to not to come.
they could decide themselves. I think they better come to witness this protests together.

Nov 4 [b]HKUST student fell from third floor to second floor at car park in Tseung Kwan O while fleeing tear gas
